title: GAY - BelAmi - Lukas Story III - Part 2
description:

This is the conclusion of the explosive trilogy following the sexual maturing of Lukas, the most beautiful young man to ever appear before a video camera. A secluded chalet, its barn and its hayloft are the perfect settings for several days of erotic fun and games, as the houseguests change partners for a kaleidoscope of couplings.

I was recently talking to some people on an internet discussion board about what our favorite Bel Ami movies were. Immediately it became apparent that for a whole lot of Bel Ami lovers, Lukas' Story 3 is George Duroy's hottest flick. It's impossible for me to decide which one really is my favorite, but Lukas' Story 3 is definitely a super movie. It's this movie that a lot of people say revealed Lukas as having come out of his boyish shell and turned in to a total stud. He definitely is a super stud in this movie as he works over bottom after bottom in awesome scene after scene. What's definitely something any Bel Ami fan - and especially one of the many who can't get enough of Lukas' Story 3 - must check out is the DVD, More Lukas' Stories. It includes new narration by Lukas Ridgeston himself, as well as a scene that was cut from the original (and that appeared on Out At Last) in which Lukas and Ion Davidov have an incredible threesome with Daniel Valent. They take turns fucking Daniel and working him over so, so good. It's one of my favorite Bel Ami scenes of all time!
